mapper.select: select r.order_seq, count(m.prod_code) all_cnt, r.order_date, r.cus_id, sum(m.od_status) od_status from t_order r, t_order_detail m where m.order_seq = r.order_seq and m.od_status = 0 group by m.order_seq
select m.order_seq, count(m.prod_code) all_cnt, r.order_date, r.cus_id, sum(m.od_status) od_status from t_order r, t_order_detail m where m.order_seq = r.order_seq ${orderQuery} group by m.order_seq

select r.order_seq , count(m.prod_code) all_cnt, r.order_date, r.cus_id, sum(m.od_status) od_status from t_order r, t_order_detail m where m.order_seq = r.order_seq and r.cus_id like concat('%',#{search},'%') group by m.order_seq

select m.prod_code, p.prod_name, m.od_cnt, r.order_seq, r.order_date, r.cus_id, m.od_status from t_order_detail m, t_product p, t_order r where r.order_seq = m.order_seq and m.prod_code = p.prod_code and m.order_seq = #{order_seq}
select p.prod_rack from t_product p, t_order_detail m where p.prod_code = m.prod_code and m.order_seq = #{order_seq}
